1289250.name: EasySave Backup Demo
1289250.description:
The EasySave Backup demo includes 100% of the basic functions of the program.

- Adding games to the database.
- Scan the saves for unknown games.
- Support for saves in the Windows registry.
- Import / export of definitions
- Latest backups, backup archive (limited) and locked backups (unlimited).
- Unlimited backup and restore of your saves.

Advanced features limitations in the demo.

- Automatic backups not available.
- Backup archive limits locked at 10 files and 5 megabytes per game.
- Advanced options not available.
